subtasks: Get rid of weeds
Disks and plows the garden (using tractor)
Check moisture content before tilling
Hand remove weeds (if necessary)
Use herbicides (e.g., glyphosate) to control weeds
Wait two weeks after herbicide application before planting
Take soil test if done less than every three years
Check pH level and adjust if needed (add lime if necessary)
Determine fertility level and required nutrients
Buy soil test kits/boxes from local county extension office or garden centers
"SUBTASK: Take soil test if haven't done in the last three years" đã đề cập việc-check , nhưng nếu không cụ thể vào làm sao thì vẫn chưa rõ. Có thể bổ sung subtask như sau:
Collect soil samples following instructions from extension office
Submit collected samples to local county extension office or garden centers
Remove weeds manually or with implements
Use mechanical methods (disc, plow) to prepare soil (maintaining moisture considerations)
Employ chemical weed control (herbicides)
Follow post-herbicide application waiting period
Conduct soil testing if not done within a three-year cycle
Interpret soil test results (pH, nutrient content) and determine actions
Apply glyphosate-based herbicide in garden
Wait two weeks after application before planting
Collect soil samples according to extension office instructions
Send samples to testing facility
Schedule soil testing through local extension office

tasks.task: Adjust soil pH based on test results
subtasks: Purchase and spread lime if needed
Identify necessary amendments (based on test results)

tasks.task: Contact local county extension office for information
subtasks: Learn about services offered by local county extension office
